analysis.Summary: Vue component that renders a section with a localized title, optional subtitle, and a list of FAQ items displayed as expandable spoilers.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a self-contained FAQ section on a landing page, driven by i18n content data passed in via props.

Components.name: Spoiler
Components.responsibility: Renders a collapsible panel for each FAQ entry with customizable header and content slots.

Components.name: IconChevronBottom
Components.responsibility: Displays a chevron icon that rotates when its parent Spoiler is opened or closed.

Functions.name: t
Functions.description: Translate a single string key based on the provided messages object.

Functions.name: tm
Functions.description: Translate an array or object map for keys, used here to retrieve the list of FAQ items.

Functions.name: te
Functions.description: Check if a translation for a given key exists in the messages object.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a landing page or parent section with `<SectionGuide :content="localeMessages"/>`, where `localeMessages` is an object of translations including `title`, `subtitle`, and `FAQ` array.
Notes: Leverages `v-html` to render rich HTML inside FAQ descriptions; ensure content is sanitized.
No scoped or additional styles defined; styling is inherited from global or parent SCSS.
Relies entirely on runtime i18n messages passed via propsâ€”no fallback defaults inside the component.
Uses `item.title` as `key` in v-for; titles must be unique.
